message.content:
cs.DC, cs.NE, cs.SY, cs.IT, cs.PF 

This paper deals with the analysis of a stochastic model of replication in large distributed storage systems. It involves the study of the variability of the loads of the nodes of the network and the investigation of several policies. The paper uses probabilistic methods and mean-field analysis to analyze the asymptotic behavior of an arbitrary node of the network when the total number of nodes gets large. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper are cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing), cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing), cs.SY (Systems and Control), cs.IT (Information Theory), and cs.PF (Probability).
